scripts.clean: rimraf dist coverage allure-results allure-report test-results logs/temp
scripts.setup: pnpm run setup:directories && pnpm run setup:env && pnpm run setup:tests
scripts.setup:directories: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['logs', 'temp', 'uploads', 'cache', 'src/controllers', 'src/services', 'src/modules', 'src/config', 'tests', 'tests/api', 'tests/e2e', 'tests/fixtures', 'allure-results', 'test-results', 'scripts'].forEach(dir => { if (!fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.mkdirSync(dir, { recursive: true }); console.log('âœ… å»ºç«‹ç›®éŒ„:', dir); } else { console.log('ðŸ“ ç›®éŒ„å·²å­˜åœ¨:', dir); } })"
scripts.setup:env:
node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('.env')) { console.log('âš ï¸  è«‹å»ºç«‹ .env æª”æ¡ˆ'); console.log('ç¯„ä¾‹å…§å®¹ï¼š'); console.log('NODE_ENV=development
PORT=7939
GROK_API_KEY=your_key
GEMINI_API_KEY=your_key'); } else { console.log('âœ… .env æª”æ¡ˆå­˜åœ¨'); }"
scripts.setup:tests: pnpm run setup:directories && pnpm run playwright:install
scripts.database:setup: pnpm run database:postgres && pnpm run database:neo4j
scripts.posttest: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:unit: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:e2e: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:allure: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.test:allure:open: pnpm run test:allure && pnpm run allure:serve
scripts.posttest:api: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:security: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:penetration: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:ai-analysis: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:grok: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:gemini: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:vertex: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:neo4j: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:controller: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:load: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.posttest:performance: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.test:full: concurrently "pnpm run start:test" "wait-on http://localhost:7939 && pnpm run test:allure"
scripts.test:force-report: playwright test --reporter=allure-playwright; allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.test:unit:force-report: playwright test --project unit --reporter=allure-playwright; allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.test:e2e:force-report: playwright test --project e2e --reporter=allure-playwright; allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.test:api:force-report: playwright test tests/api --reporter=allure-playwright; allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.test:security:force-report: playwright test tests/api/security-attacks.spec.js --reporter=allure-playwright; allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.test:ai:force-report: playwright test tests/api/ai-analysis.spec.js --reporter=allure-playwright; allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.allure:generate: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report || pnpm exec allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.allure:serve: allure serve allure-results || pnpm exec allure serve allure-results
scripts.allure:open: allure open allure-report || pnpm exec allure open allure-report
scripts.allure:check: node -e "console.log('æª¢æŸ¥ Allure çµæžœç›®éŒ„...'); const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('allure-results')) { console.log('âœ… allure-results ç›®éŒ„å­˜åœ¨'); const files = fs.readdirSync('allure-results'); console.log('æª”æ¡ˆæ•¸é‡:', files.length); files.slice(0, 5).forEach(file => console.log('  -', file)); } else { console.log('âŒ allure-results ç›®éŒ„ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè«‹å…ˆåŸ·è¡Œæ¸¬è©¦'); }"
scripts.docs:serve: echo ðŸš€ ä¾µåœ‹ä¾µåŸŽ API æ–‡æª”é‹è¡Œåœ¨: http://localhost:7939/api/docs
scripts.health:check: node -e "const http = require('http'); const req = http.get('http://localhost:7939/health', (res) => { let data = ''; res.on('data', chunk => data += chunk); res.on('end', () => { console.log('âœ… ç³»çµ±å¥åº·æª¢æŸ¥é€šéŽ', res.statusCode); console.log('å›žæ‡‰:', data); }); }); req.on('error', (e) => { console.log('âŒ ç³»çµ±æœªé‹è¡Œ:', e.message); });"
scripts.ai:test-all: concurrently "pnpm run grok:test" "pnpm run gemini:test" "pnpm run vertex:test"
scripts.ai:demo-all: pnpm run grok:demo && pnpm run gemini:demo && pnpm run vertex:demo
scripts.dev:setup: pnpm run setup && pnpm run docker:up && pnpm run database:setup
scripts.dev:clean: pnpm run clean && pnpm run docker:clean
scripts.dev:reset: pnpm run dev:clean && pnpm run dev:setup
scripts.demo:all: pnpm run health:check && pnpm run attack:vectors && pnpm run system:stats
scripts.demo:full: pnpm run health:full && pnpm run attack:demo && pnpm run report:penetration
scripts.report:allure: pnpm run test:allure && pnpm run allure:generate
scripts.ci:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test concurrently "pnpm run start:test" "wait-on http://localhost:7939 && pnpm run test:ci"
scripts.ci:setup: pnpm run setup && pnpm run playwright:install-deps
scripts.ci:full: pnpm run ci:setup && pnpm run ci:test && pnpm run allure:generate
scripts.ci:deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run test:ci && pnpm run start:prod
scripts.quick:test: pnpm run setup:tests && pnpm run test:allure && pnpm run allure:serve
scripts.quick:start: pnpm run setup:directories && pnpm run start:dev

scripts.postinstall: pnpm run setup:directories && pnpm run setup:modules
